history.proof: intros. unfold out_code in H. shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
instr: Set
data: Type
one_step: instr -> state -> state -> Prop
sss_fun: forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2
sss_dec: forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2}
P: subcode.code instr
st2: state
st1: state

Goal:
out_code (fst st1) P -> P // st1 ->> st2 -> st1 = st2

Premises:
subcode : subcode.code ?X -> nat * list ?X -> Prop where ?X : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : subcode.code instr st1 : state st2 : state |- Type]
fst : ?A * ?B -> ?A where ?A : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : subcode.code instr st1 : state st2 : state |- Type] ?B : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state),
Notation state := (nat * data)%type
out_code : nat -> subcode.code ?X -> Prop where ?X : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : subcode.code instr st1 : state st2 : state |- Type]
Notation code := (nat * list instr)%type

Tauto.I : Tauto.GFormula -> option ?AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : subcode.code instr st1 : state st2 : state |- Type] ?TX : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state ->...-> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : subcode.code instr st1 : state st2 : state |- Type]

VarMap.Empty : VarMap.t ?A where ?A : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : subcode.code instr st1 : state st2 : state |- Type]

EnvRing.PEc : ?C -> EnvRing.PExpr ?C where ?C : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : subcode.code instr st1 : state st2 : state |- Type]

EnvRing.PEadd : EnvRing.PExpr ?C -> EnvRing.PExpr ?C -> EnvRing.PExpr ?C where ?C : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : subcode.code instr st1 : state st2 : state |- Type]

VarMap.Branch : VarMap.t ?A -> ?A -> VarMap.t ?A -> VarMap.t ?A where ?A : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : subcode.code instr st1 : state st2 : state |- Type]
EnvRing.PX : EnvRing.Pol ?C -> BinNums.positive -> EnvRing.Pol ?C -> EnvRing.Pol ?C where ?C : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : subcode.code instr st1 : state st2 : state |- Type]
subcode_sss_compute_instr : forall (P : code) (i : instr) (st1 st2 st3 : state), st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2 -> (fst st1, i :: nil) <sc P -> P // st2 -> > st3 -> P // st1 -> > st3
subcode_sss_step_inv_1 : forall (P : code) (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), (fst st1, i :: nil) <sc P -> P // st1 :1> st2 -> st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2
subcode_sss_terminates_instr : forall (P : code) (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2 -> (fst st1, i :: nil) <sc P -> P // st2 ↓ -> P // st1 ↓
in_sss_step : forall (k : nat) (l : list instr) (i : instr) (r : list instr) (st1 st2 : state), fst st1 = k + length l -> st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2 -> (k, l ++ i :: r) // st1 :1> st2
subcode_sss_steps_stop : forall (P : code) (i : instr) (k : nat) (st1 st2 : state), (forall st : state, ~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st) -> (fst st1, i :: nil) <sc P -> P//st1-[k] -> st2 -> k = 0 /\ st1 = st2
subcode_sss_steps_inv_1 : forall (P : code) (i : instr) (k : nat) (st1 st2 st3 : state), st1 <> st3 -> st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2 -> (fst st1, i :: nil) <sc P -> P//st1-[k] -> st3 -> exists k' : nat, k = S k' /\ P//st2-[k'] -> st3
sss_step = fun (P : code) (st1 st2 : state) => exists (k : nat) (l : list instr) (i : instr) (r : list instr) (d : data), P = (k, l ++ i :: r) /\ st1 = (k + length l, d) /\ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2 : code -> state -> state -> Prop
sss_step_fun : forall (P : code) (s t1 t2 : state), P // s :1> t1 -> P // s :1> t2 -> t1 = t2
sss_stall = fun (ii : instr) (st : state) => forall st' : state, ~ st ⟬ ii ⦒ st' : instr -> state -> Prop
sss_compute_inv : forall (P : subcode.code instr) (st1 st2 st3 : state), out_code (fst st3) P -> P // st1 -> > st2 -> P // st1 -> > st3 -> P // st2 -> > st3
sss_steps_stop : forall (P : subcode.code instr) (k : nat) (st1 st2 : state), out_code (fst st1) P -> P//st1-[k] -> st2 -> st1 = st2
subcode_sss_subcode_compute_inv : forall (P : subcode.code instr) (Q : code) (k : nat) (st1 st2 st3 : state), in_code (fst st1) P -> out_code (fst st2) P -> out_code (fst st3) P -> P <sc Q -> P // st1 -> > st2 -> Q//st1-[k] -> st3 -> exists q : nat, q < k /\ Q//st2-[q] -> st3
subcode_sss_compute_inv : forall (P : subcode.code instr) (Q : code) (st1 st3 : state), P <sc Q -> out_code (fst st3) P -> Q // st1 -> > st3 -> exists st2 : state, P // st1 -> > st2 /\ Q // st2 -> > st3 /\ out_code (fst st2) P
sss_terminates_ind : forall (P : code) (R : state -> Prop), (forall st : state, out_code (fst st) P -> R st) -> (forall st1 : state, (forall (Q : subcode.code instr) (st2 : state), Q <sc P -> Q // st1 -+> st2 -> P // st2 ↓ -> R st2) -> R st1) -> forall st : state, P // st ↓ -> R st
sss_step_subcode_inv : forall (P : code) (ii : instr) (st st' : state), (fst st, ii :: nil) <sc P -> P // st :1> st' -> st ⟬ ii ⦒ st'
sss_compute_step_out_inv : forall (P : subcode.code instr) (k : nat) (st1 st2 st3 : state), st1 <> st2 -> out_code (fst st3) P -> P // st1 -> > st2 -> P//st1-[k] -> st3 -> exists q : nat, q < k /\ P//st2-[q] -> st3
subcode_sss_step_inv : forall (P : subcode.code instr) (Q : code) (st1 st2 : state), P <sc Q -> in_code (fst st1) P -> Q // st1 :1> st2 -> P // st1 :1> st2
subcode_sss_compute_trans : forall (P : subcode.code instr) (Q : code) (st1 st2 st3 : state), P <sc Q -> P // st1 -> > st2 -> Q // st2 -> > st3 -> Q // st1 -> > st3
subcode_sss_compute : forall (P : subcode.code instr) (Q : code) (st1 st2 : state), P <sc Q -> P // st1 -> > st2 -> Q // st1 -> > st2
sss_steps_fun : forall (P : code) (k : nat) (s t1 t2 : state), P//s-[k] -> t1 -> P//s-[k] -> t2 -> t1 = t2
in_out_code : forall (X : Type) (i : nat) (P : subcode.code X), in_code i P -> out_code i P -> False

```  
intros.

intros.
unfold out_code in H.
unfold out_code in H.
unfold "//" in H0.
unfold "//" in H0.
apply sss_compute_inv with (st1 := st1) (st3 := st2) in H0; auto.
destruct H0 as [st2 [H1 [H2 H3]]].
apply sss_fun with (i := P) (s := st1) (t1 := st2) (t2 := st3) in H1; auto.
subst. auto.
```

original: intros. intros. intros. intros. intros. intros. intros. intros. unfold out_code in H. unfold out_code in H. unfold "//" in H0. unfold "//" in H0. apply sss_compute_inv with (st1 := st1) (st3 := st2) in H0; auto. destruct H0 as [st2 [H1 [H2 H3]]]. apply sss_fun with (i := P) (s := st1) (t1 := st2) (t2 := st3) in H1; auto. subst. auto.
